A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sorry to say\, but this movie was a stinker. Too many plots and dumb things happening.  I'm an SW fan but this is worse than the prequels. Please no more critters or robots just to sell stuff in stores. The flying Leia\, the destroyed/not destroyed bridge\, Poe leading a charge and losing his fleet but only losing rank\, horrible space battles where the evil empire can't trace the rebels that are right outside their windows\, etc. Nope\, it was really bad!
